long_description: With an aero frame and dependable Shimano 105 components, the Scott Speedster 20 Bike delivers efficient speed for long road rides. Hydroformed, double-butted 6061 aluminum frame boasts aerodynamic tube shaping and internal cable routing for sleek performance. Carbon fork with alloy steerer tube reduces weight and helps damp energy-draining road vibrations. Compact Shimano 105 crankset is paired with a wide-ranging 12-30 cassette for 20 easy-spinning gear combinations to handle every ride, from steep hills to speedy pursuits. Shimano 105 derailleurs and shifters ensure precise shifts and dependable performance. Easily manage your speed, from fine-tuning to outright powerful stops, with the Shimano dual-pivot caliper brakes. Syncros wheels are wrapped with Schwalbe Lugano tires to deliver great road feel, grip and low rolling resistance. Please note: Pedals are not included. Specs on the Scott Speedster 20 Bike are subject to change.
short_description: With an aero frame and dependable Shimano 105 components, the Scott Speedster 20 Bike delivers efficient speed for long road rides.
